feature.label: ATHENA SOA Methodology (Feature)
feature.description:
The ATHENA SOA methodology feature contains online help documenting the ATHENA baseline methodology for SOA. The feature has been developed as an extension for Rational Software Modeler (RSM).
The development of the SOA methodology feature is partly funded by the European Commission through the ATHENA integrated project (IST-507849). The work does not represent the view of the European Commission or the ATHENA consortium and the developers are solely responsible for the feature's content.
